title: Helping customers use Amazon EBS volumes with their Amazon ECS tasks
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) consists of 200+ products/services, and there are many integrations between services. I worked on documentation for a cross-service integration between Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) and Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) that allows customers to attach block storage to their containerized applications.

frontMatter.sidebar_label: Amazon ECS integration with Amazon EBS
